TEXT.TITLE: N.C. FEDERAL SAVINGS <NCFS> ELECTS OFFICERS
TEXT.BODY: North Carolina Savings and Loan Association elected J. Graham Harwood its chairman, and R. Martin Hall its president and chief operating officer. The company said the chairman's post has been vacant two and a half years. It also said Harwood, who was president, would retain his chief executive officer's position. Reuter
